featured.title: Dynamic Vue.js Developer Portfolio
featured.description: This project showcases my expertise in Vue.js through the development of a dynamic, responsive portfolio website designed to feature my software projects and professional accomplishments. It's a hint at my dedication to continuous learning and my passion for combining aesthetic design with functional technology.

projects.title: Vocal Magic
projects.description: An audio processing toolkit designed to transform and enhance vocal performances in real-time.

projects.title: AudioFlex
projects.description: A Pure Python Suite of Algorithms to Stretch Audio Duration and/or Pitch

projects.title: Synthon
projects.description: Transform your MIDI inputs into a symphony of synthesized sounds, all powered by Python.
